message: Sometimes "1 day ago" isn't as granular as you'd like it to be.
Hovering over any of the timestamps (i.e. "43 minutes ago") always displays the popup text "0 minutes ago"
i wonder why there's a pop-up for that at all
I reported this like 6 years ago :D
I think it'd be nice if it displayed the actual time (i.e. 9:30pm) or something.
yeah, but then you have to deal with timezone issue
which is why everyone started moving towards relative timestamps
I see, I guess that makes sense.

It's when you come back after a day of being away from Convore that it really becomes important. If displaying the actual time is undesirable, maybe making the timestamps more granular within the 1 day range? (1 day 5 hours ago, etc.)
Could just be my preference though so... :)
because the timestamp isn't really a good way to do that, unless you have an insanely good memory
@eron_v what's the underlying use case? are you interested in knowing what's happened since you had visited last?
